Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Ashland, Foster, Broadway due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Ashland, Foster, Broadway then resume their normal route, due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp Temporary Reroute at Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp. buses are temp. rrtd via Sheridan, Pratt, Clark, Ashland, Foster and Sheridan, near Devon/Broadway

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #84 Peterson Temporary Reroute near Devon/Broadway
ShortDescription: #84 Peterson  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#84 Peterson  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to fire department activity near Devon/Broadway.

Eastbound buses will operate via Ridge, Clark, Ashland, Foster, Broadway, and Berwyn, then resume their normal route. 

Westbound buses will operate via Berwyn, Sheridan, Foster, Ashland, Clark, and Ridge, then resume their normal route. 

Allow extra travel time.
